testcase.name: System should allow to read information customer
testcase.system-out: Given customer endpoint "https://www.gmibank.com/api/tp-customers"..........passed Then user should read all customer data that is created.....................passed

testcase.name: System should allow to create a new country
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to create country endpoint "https://www.gmibank.com/api/tp-countries" and create new country.passed Then user validate created country..........................................passed

testcase.name: User can update a country
testcase.system-out: Given user can update any country with endPoint "https://www.gmibank.com/api/tp-countries" "Italia Demo New" and its id "95053".passed

testcase.name: User can delete a country
testcase.system-out: Given user should be delete a country with using "https://www.gmibank.com/api/tp-countries" and its extension "/95053" and verify.passed

testcase.name: validate all data by using database
testcase.system-out: Given database connection with db using "jdbc:postgresql://157.230.48.97:5432/gmibank_db" , "techprodb_user" and "Techpro_@126".passed And database gmibank user reads the country data using "Select * from tp_country" and "name".passed Then database gmibank validate country data.................................passed

testcase.name: create customer pdf file by using DataBase
testcase.system-out: Given database connection for pdf generator with db using "jdbc:postgresql://157.230.48.97:5432/gmibank_db" , "techprodb_user" and "Techpro_@126".passed And pdf user provides the query "Select * from tp_customer".................passed
